    • getPropertyValue

      static String getPropertyValue​(String property)
      Returns value of the property. It searches for a value across all known PropertySource's
      Parameters:
      property - is name of the property
      Returns:
      string value if the property is defined or null in other cases

    • isPropertyKeyPresent

      static boolean isPropertyKeyPresent​(String property)
      Returns is property with defined name present or not. It searches across all known PropertySource's
      Parameters:
      property - is name of the property
      Returns:
      true if the property with defined name present or false in other cases
